RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 1 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 37. Claiming Purse 5500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,200, if for $2,500, allowed 3 lbs. Montana Breds Preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SANDPLUM CREEK set pressured pace, drew off. JOHNNY JUDE stalked, game for place. PALACEDANCER forced early pace, evenly. FLUSHING FLASH wide first turn.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BHS Open Futurity Trial MILES CITY RACE 2 250 Y Dirt CR: 72. Futurity Trial Purse 2500. FOR REGISTERED 2 YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES THAT HAVE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE BY PAYMENTS FOR THE BHS QUARTER HORSE OPEN FUTURITY. $250 at time of Entry. No Sex Allowance. Finals to be Run May 21, 2023. Weights: 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: Y O FIFTY CONCERTS all out. EYESA FAST ONE broke in, brushed. THAT RECKLESS PETE brushed break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BHS Open Futurity Trial MILES CITY RACE 3 250 Y Dirt CR: 72. Futurity Trial Purse 2500. FOR REGISTERED 2 YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES THAT HAVE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE BY PAYMENTS FOR THE BHS QUARTER HORSE OPEN FUTURITY. $250 at time of Entry. No Sex Allowance. Finals to be Run May 21, 2023. Weights: 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE FABULOUS DYNASTY dueled late, held on. MOON EM N DASH pinched, late gain, dueled, just missed. JLM EASTER ROSIE bumped. PAINT THIS CHICK broke in, bumped.

ENTRY.OWNER: Anderson Deanna and Foster Casey J

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Em N Dash
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched, late gain, dueled, just missed

Finals to be Run May 21, 2023. Weights: 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHOOTER ZOOM dueled late, held on. COME TOGETHER hopped break, dueled late, just missed. ROCKEN REMI hesitated break.

ENTRY.NAME: Come Together
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped break, dueled late, just missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BHS Open Futurity Trial MILES CITY RACE 5 250 Y Dirt CR: 72. Futurity Trial Purse 2500. FOR REGISTERED 2 YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES THAT HAVE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE BY PAYMENTS FOR THE BHS QUARTER HORSE OPEN FUTURITY. $250 at time of Entry. No Sex Allowance. Finals to be Run May 21, 2023. Weights: 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICON DOIT broke in, bumped, dueled late, held on. BHR FLASHING NICKERS dueled late. TC RAMBLING MOON bumped break. VICTORIA MARIA bumped break.

ENTRY.NAME: Icon Doit
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped, dueled late, held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 6 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 5500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $2,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SINGANDCRYINDUBAI gained command, won driving. DANCE FOR RANSOM chased pace, late bid wide. LADDIE BOY shuffled back, mild late gain. XTREME LYRA mild bid. BIG MACINTOSH rallied early, gave way.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 7 330 Y Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 6000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TW ITSALRIGHTNOW bumped break, all out. THERE HE IS GONE rallied, game effort. KR RUNAWAY FOOSE bumped break. HASTA BE A MOOSE dueled, gave way. BHR LIGHT MY SPARK good try.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 8 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 6000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PO BOY pressed pace 3 wide, gained command, driving. HOLIDAY JOKE steadied early, late bid stretch. TEXAS LONG BOW pressed pace 2 wide, held for show. LOST THE MINISTER unhurried early, mild bid. AFTER THE CANDY rushed to lead, gave way. Stewards Inquiry, #4 PO BOY was disqualified for interference with #3 HOLIDAY JOKE into first turn and placed Second.

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Long Bow
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, held for show

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Po Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, gained command, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 9 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 5500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weights, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SASSY CAT settled, bid outside, won driving. ABRAA JABRAA chased speed, led, caught. MAGIC IN A HAT late bid inside. JOE G'S PAYBACK led till late, gave way. HAYNESPUN 4 wide first turn. MALIBU ROSE failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Haynespun
ENTRY.OWNER: Rankin Ila K and Warren Kayla

ENTRY.NAME: Joe G's Payback
ENTRY.OWNER: Cross Kent and Cross Melissa L
